College_Summary: ImaginXP is India’s leading UX design and design thinking organization that has trained and certified 15000+ professionals in this field. The courses run at ImaginXP are approved by leading state governments and the organization is also a knowledge partner with NASSCOM and Facebook in its initiative of Design4India. ImaginXP brings out industry-led curriculum for Bachelor’s and master’s programs in UX design and design thinking. ImaginXP is a pioneer in the field of UX Design and design thinking education, bringing together industry professionals and academicians to create industry-relevant programs. With a total of 95+ faculty and collaboration for faculty exchange from leading universities and institutes in UX design like CIID – Copenhagen, ImaginXP is bringing quality design thinking and UX design education to India. Their vision is to make India a global design and innovation hub bringing world-class education to Indian students.
